channel.title: Business review
channel.description:
This series, hosted by Ross Wilhelm, focuses on current news stories that relate to business and economic activity.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Protecting investors
item.description: In program number 395, Ross Wilhelm talks about protecting the investing public.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Nixon's approach to inflation
item.description: In program number 407, Ross Wilhelm discusses the Nixon administration's approach to dealing with inflation.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Balance of payments crisis
item.description: In program number 411, Ross Wilhelm revisits the issues of balance of payments deficits.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Travel time to airports
item.description: In program number 391, Ross Wilhelm talks about the issue of excessive time spent travelling between urban areas and airports.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Economic growth
item.description: In program number 416, Ross Wilhelm talks about methods of maintaining economic growth.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: New business formations
item.description: In program number 410, Ross Wilhelm talks about the levels of new business formations and mergers.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Pressure on the dollar
item.description: In program number 400, Ross Wilhelm talks about pressure on the American dollar.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Wage price guideposts
item.description: In program number 398, Ross Wilhelm talks about wage price guideposts in the United States.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Conglomerate firms
item.description: In program number 412, Ross Wilhelm talks about the rise of conglomerate firms.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Leisure time crisis
item.description: In program number 419, Ross Wilhelm talks about the concept of a "leisure time crisis," related to work and free time.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Savings bonds
item.description: In program number 405, Ross Wilhelm criticizes the current system that the American government uses to sell savings bonds.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Retail cooperatives
item.description: In program number 413, Ross Wilhelm discusses retail cooperatives and why they haven't succeeded in the United States as they have elsewhere in the world.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Antitrust laws
item.description: In program number 415, Ross Wilhelm discusses recent developments with antitrust laws.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: International monetary policies
item.description: In program number 392, Ross Wilhelm talks about the issue of international monetary policies.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: DLJ goes public
item.description: In program number 420, Ross Wilhelm talks about the decision that a brokerage firm on Wall Street made to go public.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Fixed exchange rates
item.description: In program number 406, Ross Wilhelm talks about fixed exchange rates and their role in the troubled international monetary system.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Nixon's style of operations
item.description: In program number 404, Ross Wilhelm talks about President Richard Nixon's style of operation during his first few months in office.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Suez Canal
item.description: In program number 408, Ross Wilhelm talks about the Suez Canal and its business aspects.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Business review #388
item.description: No information available.

item.title: Oil in Alaska
item.description: In program number 399, Ross Wilhelm talks about the discovery of oil in Alaska and its financial repercussions.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Balance of payments deficits
item.description: In program number 396, Ross Wilhelm talks about the United States' problems with a balance of payments deficit.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Water issues
item.description: In program number 393, Ross Wilhelm talks about the issue of too much water as a problem in agriculture.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Government finance difficulties
item.description: In program number 397, Ross Wilhelm talks about the financial difficulties that local and state governments have had, although they might be beneficial longterm.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Steel
item.description: In program number 409, Ross Wilhelm talks about the steel industry.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Voluntary army
item.description: In program number 401, Ross Wilhelm asserts that the draft should be eliminated and a voluntary army should be in place. He explores arguments on both sides.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Banning advertising for cigarettes
item.description: In program number 402, Ross Wilhelm talks about a possible ban on cigarette advertising.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Group theory
item.description: In program number 403, Ross Wilhelm talks about the issue of whether or not the group theory of economic progress is valid.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Currency exchange rates
item.description: In program number 414, Ross Wilhelm discusses fixed currency exchange rates.
item.dc:creator: University of Michigan
item.dc:subject: Business.

item.title: Ireland
item.description: In program number 394, Ross Wilhelm talks about unrest in Ireland and its impact on business.

item.dc:subject: Business.
